section.title: User permissions
section.para: When role based permissions are enabled (see administration guide), it's possible limit user permissions.
To add a new user, click the button Create new user mapping.

note.para: The user guest is special: if the user exists, Guvnor will automatically log in users as guest.

warning.para: Do not delete or cripple the users admin or mailman. They are users used by the system.

section.para: To add or remove a permission to a user, select a user and click on the button Open. Click on the green + to add a permission type:

listitem.para: Admin: this user can do everything
Analyst or Analyst read-only: analyst permissions for a specific category. Create the category before attempting to assign users to it.
Package admin, Package developer or Package read-only: package permissions for a specific package. Create the package before attempting to assign users to it.
